about.firstParagraph: The sybil community, once a unified and thriving group, has been torn apart by the selfish and greedy actions of Bryan Hutt. With a zero-sum mentality, he has ignited a civil war within the community, causing chaos and destruction. Leading his charge is Emperor Srep1776, a traitor who has abandoned his fellow sybils for his own personal gain.
about.secondParagraph: We, the Imperial Anarchists, refuse to stand by and watch as Bryan Hutt's tyranny continues. We will rise up in defiance and fight back against his oppressive regime. Our weapon of choice is the $ZRO token, a powerful tool that we will use to restore balance to the Force and bring peace and unity back to the sybil community.

buy.choose: To choose your side copy one of adresses above

info.1: Minimum deposit of 1 TON or equivalent USDT in the TON network
info.2: 50,000 TON will be collected during the presale
info.3: Funds collected in excess of the limit will be returned in equivalent USDT in the TON network
info.4: Deposits of less than 1 TON will be used to buy back and burn tokens and will NOT be returned

1.1: The beginning of $ZRO expansion on Twitter and Telegram

2.1: AIRDROP to users of the game 'Sybil Wars'

3.1: Creation of interactive quests for onboarding new users

4.1: A new Death Star for every loyal sybil
